QuestData.Title: Further Research: Aealic
QuestData.Description:
Maw Walker, you have made some wonderous discoveries, but there are still secrets to uncover.
You have taken the first step, in unlocking the console and I believe that you are ready to take another.
Please go investigate the console and see what new piece of the pattern unfolds itself to you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the Cypher Console in Exile's Hollow further.
QuestData.RewardText: New knowledge! The First Ones truly did leave such marvelous insights.
